product_desc:
Guardhat is an industrial wearable that uses IoT technologies to protect and empower industrial workers. Guardhat blends existing and emerging technologies to prevent safety incidents and to intervene more effectively when incidents happen. Beyond safety, the Guardhat open platform can deploy additional applications involving real-time access to the front line workforce.

Guardhat market includes all workers in industries with a hard hat requirement. There are over 13 million workers in relevant industries in the U.S. The global market is estimated at 150-200 million users.
high_concept: Industrial wearable company that uses IoT to protect and empower industrial workers.
